name: Rayquaza

ability.name: Ozone Wall
ability.effect: Your Benched Pokemon take no damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Atmospheric Storm
attacks.effect: You may search your discard pile for a Basic Energy, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

flavor: This Pokemon is famous for keeping the squabbling Kyogre and Groudon from fighting and destroying the world. It would prefer to enjoy the skies, but everybody's got a 9-5.
